dcterms:description: A large dataset for stance detection extracted from the Kialo platform, containing discussion chains with stance labels (support or contrast) assigned to each claim.
dcterms:title: Kialo Dataset for Stance Detection (SDK)

dcterms:description: A dataset for stance detection and rumor evaluation, containing discussion threads from social media with labels indicating support, query, deny, and comment.
dcterms:title: SQDC Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset focused on abusive language detection, containing tweets labeled as abusive or not abusive, considering the context of previous tweets.
dcterms:title: ContextAbuse Dataset
